name: DXADualEnergyXrayAbsorptiometryScanNonHipOrSpine
title: DXA (Dual energy Xray Absorptiometry) Scan Non Hip or Spine
purpose: (Clinical Focus: The purpose of this value set is to represent concepts for a diagnostic study for dual-energy x-ray absorptiometry (DXA) scan of bones other than the hip or spine.),(Data Element Scope: This value set may use a model element related to Diagnostic Study.),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes concepts that represent a diagnostic study for bone density using DXA scans of the femur, radius, ulna, lumbar spine, hip, calcaneus and skeletal system.),(Exclusion Criteria: Excludes concepts that represent diagnostic studies for DXA scans of the hip or spine or order only codes.)
